pageContext.claim: “Then [in the debate] I said, 'Joe, say the words, Law enforcement, say the words, Law and order.' He wouldn't do it. He wouldn't do it. Number one, he couldn't remember the two words in conjunction. But more importantly, he didn't want to lose the radical left. Because if he says those words, he loses the radical left.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims Biden refused to use the words "law and order" in the first presidential debate. Biden had, in fact, said the three words, arguing that he was in favor of “law and order with justice, where people get treated fairly.”
